title.narrative: Expansion of HRMMU activities aimed at protection of civilian population, and promotion of remedy and reparation to survivors and their families in response to the 2022 Conflict in Ukraine

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to monitor the human rights situation in Ukraine and to conduct advocacy. The findings from OHCHR's monitoring will inform the broader humanitarian response. Some 29,000 people including 10,000 women, 15,000 men and 4,000 children will benefit from the project.
